title: How to Avoid Time Drifts on Your Linux Servers with Chrony
author: Jack Wallen
description: You'd be surprised how many problems a Linux system can have if its time is not synchronized correctly. Here's how to use Chrony to get NTP in line.
cntitle: 如何在 Linux 服务器上使用 Chrony 避免时间漂移
cndescription: 你会惊讶于如果 Linux 系统的时间不同步，它可能会遇到多少问题。以下是如何使用 Chrony 来校准 NTP。
